articles.title: No Sex for 1 Month for Coronavirus Survivors, Says Study - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: A study in Thailand has stated that anyone who's just recovered from the coronavirus should refrain from having sex for at least 30 days after being cleared, as the virus could spread through semen.
articles.content:
You've gone through the pain and fear of catching the coronavirus, you're finally clear, you're feeling fresh, frisky, and ready to tumble into the sheets with your loved one— only to find out you now have to wait at least 30 days before having sex.
